Armagetron Advanced

Drive your lightcycle and leave a lightwall behind you. Survive as long as you can and try to make other run into walls.

Getting the game

DOWNLOAD

Tips

  • Press the down arrow key to brake
  • Drive as close as you can to a wall to get a speed boost

Connecting

Use the arrow keys to nagivate to Play Game and press <Enter>. Then go to Multiplayer and then to Custom Connect.

Enter 192.168.122.44 in the Address field and keep the port number at 4534. Navigate down to Connect to Server to join.

You should now be connected.
